mapper.select: /* 단일 공지사항 리스트 조회 쿼리 */ SELECT notice_no AS noticeNo , title AS title , content AS content , use_yn AS useYnEnum , reg_dt AS regDt , mod_dt AS modDt from web_app_test.tb_notice where notice_no = #{noticeNo}

/* 전체 공지사항 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select notice_no as noticeNo , title as title , content as content , use_yn as useYnEnum , reg_dt as regDt , mod_dt as modDt from web_app_test.tb_notice order by regDt desc, noticeNo desc limit #{noticeSize}

/* 전체 공지사항 리스트 조회 쿼리(페이지네이션) */
select notice_no as noticeNo , title as title , content as content , use_yn as useYnEnum , reg_dt as regDt , mod_dt as modDt from web_app_test.tb_notice order by regDt desc, noticeNo desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

/* 전체 notice의 개수를 조회하는 쿼리 */
select count(*) from web_app_test.tb_notice where notice_no > 0
